channel.title: Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl"

item.title: Re: Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl
item.content:encoded: Anonymous level 2 is not easy to get and impossible in season 1 ;)

item.title: Re: Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl
item.content:encoded: Doesn't Anonymous Lvl. 2 have a jutsu that auto-levels any allies if used on their mission?

item.title: Re: Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl
item.content:encoded:
Just bad luck.

The rumor is that each ally starts off with a 25% chance to level up. Every time you do that mission, it increases by 4%. If you've done Billy's 5 times, he should have a 45% chance to level up on the next go. If you've passed Pinky's 10 times, she should have a 65% chance.

There are no known jutsu that affect leveling up at this time.

It happens to all of us.

item.title: Leveling Billy/Pinky/Stalkergirl
item.content:encoded:
Much as I'd love this to be straight forward, its really starting to piss me off.

I've leveled up Stalkergirl the 1st or 2nd time I took the relevant mission, Billy & Pinky is proving to be a hell of alot more annoying, I've done Billy's mission 4 or 5 times at this stage & I've lost count of Pinky's mission after I passed it for the 10th time.

I'm using 'The Gates' to pretty much auto pass it at this stage, which I've come to the conclusion that is where the problem lies in passing it.

Is it just my bad luck that they've not leveled of is there some little 'trick' to pass it.
